column5: Hey Guys,  Quick question..... I bought an auger last week from CTC for regular price and this week they have gone on sale. Do you think if I bring in the receipt that they will give me the difference in price? I know there are certain clothing outlets that will do that but I am not sure about CTC. It would be roughly $30.00 difference. Thanks in advance.   G
I am in the exact same boat as you. I paid $80 + for mine and now they are on sale for $49. Gonna see what I can do today about it.
If an item goes on sale within two weeks of purchase you can take your receipt in and they will credit you the difference.  Happy ice fishing!
They'll definately give you back the difference!!...I've done it many times in the past!!

CTC has an incredible return policy.  2 years ago I purchased an item from them for $250 and FOUR MONTHS LATER it was on sale for $200, so I took my reciept to the store and asked if they could do anything for me.  They said "absolutely Sir", and without even a question, they returned $50 + tax  Ya gotta luv that !!
Thanks so much gang... I am off to CTC shortly.
